1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Clock: distance between two times.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Type.Time.Clock
6  ( -- * Clock
7    Clock (..),
8    ToClock (..),
9    clockBodyToMix,
10
11    -- * Constructor
12    clockFromDhms, clockFromDhm,
13    clockFromDh, clockFromD,
14    dhmsFromSec, secFromHms,
15
16    -- * Property
17    clockDaysSec,
18    clockDaysClock,
19    clockSign, 
20    clockPrecision,
21    clockAtts, clockAlter,
22
23    -- * Conversion
24    clockMap,
25    clockMap2,
26
27    -- * Days and seconds
28    DaysSec,
29    daysSec,
30    daySeconds,
31  ) where
32
33import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
34import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
35import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Time.Date          as T
36import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type.Time.Parts         as T
37import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Message            as Msg
38
39
40-- ----------------------  Data type
41
42-- | Clock as distance between two times.
43data Clock
44    = ClockDhms T.Days T.Sec    -- ^ Clock represented by multiple of second
45    | ClockDhm  T.Days T.Sec    -- ^ Clock represented by multiple of minute
46    | ClockDh   T.Days T.Sec    -- ^ Clock represented by multiple of hour
47    | ClockD    T.Days          -- ^ Clock represented by multiple of day
48
49instance Eq Clock where
50    (==) = O.ordEq
51
52instance Ord Clock where
53    compare = O.compareOn clockDaysSec
54
55-- | Convertible to clock.
56class ToClock a where
57    toClock :: a -> Clock
58
59instance ToClock Clock where
60    toClock = id
61
62instance ToClock T.ClockParts where
63    toClock (T.ClockPartsSec  d h m s)  = clockFromDhms d h m s
64    toClock (T.ClockPartsMin  d h m)    = clockFromDhm  d h m
65    toClock (T.ClockPartsHour d h)      = clockFromDh   d h
66    toClock (T.ClockPartsDays d)        = clockFromD    d
67
68-- | Create clock from days, hour, minute, and second.
69--
70--   >>> clockFromDhms 1 9 40 20
71--   |1'09:40:20|
72--
73clockFromDhms :: T.Days -> T.Hour -> T.Min -> T.Sec -> Clock
74clockFromDhms d h m s = ClockDhms d $ secFromHms (h, m, s)
75
76-- | Create clock from days, hour, and minute.
77clockFromDhm :: T.Days -> T.Hour -> T.Min -> Clock
78clockFromDhm d h m = ClockDhm d $ secFromHms (h, m, 0)
79
80-- | Create clock from days and hour.
81clockFromDh :: T.Days -> T.Hour -> Clock
82clockFromDh d h = ClockDh d $ secFromHms (h, 0, 0)
83
84-- | Create clock from days.
85clockFromD :: T.Days -> Clock
86clockFromD = ClockD
87
88-- | Aggregate hour, minute, and second into single second.
89secFromHms :: (T.Hour, T.Min, T.Sec) -> T.Sec
90secFromHms (h, m, s) = s + 60 * (m + 60 * h)
91
92-- | Decompose second into days, hour, minute and second parts.
93--
94--   >>> dhmsFromSec 333333
95--   (3,9,15,33)
96--
97dhmsFromSec :: T.Sec -> (T.Days, T.Hour, T.Min, T.Sec)
98dhmsFromSec sec =
99    let (m', s)   = sec `quotRem` 60
100        (h', m)   = m'  `quotRem` 60
101        (d,  h)   = h'  `quotRem` 24
102    in (toInteger d, h, m, s)
103
104
105-- ----------------------  Property
106
107-- | Days and second of clock.
108--
109--   >>> clockDaysSec $ clockFromDhms 1 9 15 33
110--   (1, 33333)
111--
112clockDaysSec :: Clock -> DaysSec
113clockDaysSec (ClockDhms d s)  = (d, s)
114clockDaysSec (ClockDhm  d s)  = (d, s)
115clockDaysSec (ClockDh   d s)  = (d, s)
116clockDaysSec (ClockD    d)    = (d, 0)
117
118-- | Split days part from clock.
119--
120--   >>> clockDaysClock $ clockFromDhms 1 9 15 33
121--   (1, |09:15:33|)
122--
123clockDaysClock :: Clock -> (T.Days, Clock)
124clockDaysClock (ClockDhms d s)  = (d, ClockDhms 0 s)
125clockDaysClock (ClockDhm  d s)  = (d, ClockDhm  0 s)
126clockDaysClock (ClockDh   d s)  = (d, ClockDh   0 s)
127clockDaysClock (ClockD    d)    = (d, ClockD    0)
128
129-- | Sign of clock as @-1@, @0@, @1@.
130--
131--   >>> clockSign $ clockFromDhms 1 9 15 33
132--   1
133--
134--   >>> clockSign $ clockFromDhms 0 0 0 0
135--   0
136--
137clockSign :: Clock -> Int
138clockSign c | d == 0 && s == 0  = 0
139            | d >= 0 && s >= 0  = 1
140            | d <= 0 && s <= 0  = -1
141            | otherwise         = B.bug $ "inconsistent " ++ show c
142            where (d, s) = clockDaysSec c
143
144-- | Precision string of clock.
145clockPrecision :: Clock -> String
146clockPrecision (ClockDhms _ _)   = "sec"
147clockPrecision (ClockDhm  _ _)   = "min"
148clockPrecision (ClockDh   _ _)   = "hour"
149clockPrecision (ClockD    _)     = "day"
150
151-- | All attributes of clock.
152clockAtts :: Clock -> (T.Days, Maybe T.Hour, Maybe T.Min, Maybe T.Sec)
153clockAtts clock =
154    case clock of
155      ClockDhms _ _  -> (day + d, Just h, Just m, Just s)
156      ClockDhm  _ _  -> (day + d, Just h, Just m, Nothing)
157      ClockDh   _ _  -> (day + d, Just h, Nothing, Nothing)
158      ClockD    _    -> (day + d, Nothing, Nothing, Nothing)
159    where
160      (day, sec)      = abs2 $ clockDaysSec clock
161      (d, h, m, s)    = dhmsFromSec sec
162
163abs2 :: (Num a, Num b) => O.Map (a, b)
164abs2 = map2 abs abs
165
166map2 :: (a -> a') -> (b -> b') -> (a, b) -> (a', b')
167map2 f g (x, y) = (f x, g y)
168
169-- | Replace elements of clock.
170clockAlter :: Maybe T.Days -> Maybe T.Hour -> Maybe T.Min -> Maybe T.Sec -> O.Map Clock
171clockAlter d' h' m' s' clock =
172    case clockAtts clock of
173      (d, Just h,  Just m,  Just s)  -> clockFromDhms (d' ! d) (h' ! h) (m' ! m) (s' ! s)
174      (d, Just h,  Just m,  Nothing) -> clockFromDhm  (d' ! d) (h' ! h) (m' ! m)
175      (d, Just h,  Nothing, Nothing) -> clockFromDh   (d' ! d) (h' ! h)
176      (d, Nothing, Nothing, Nothing) -> clockFromD    (d' ! d)
177      _                              -> B.bug "clockAlter"
178    where
179      Just x' ! _  = x'
180      Nothing ! x  = x
181
182
183-- ----------------------  Writer
184
185-- | @|D'HH:MM:SS|@
186instance Show Clock where
187    show = B.mixToFlatString . B.mixEncode
188
189-- | @|D'HH:MM:SS|@
190instance B.MixEncode Clock where
191    mixEncode = clockToMix
192
193-- | Convert clock to mix text with vertical bars.
194clockToMix :: Clock -> B.MixText
195clockToMix = B.mixBracket ("|", "|") . clockBodyToMix
196
197-- | Convert clock to mix text.
198--
199--   >>> clockBodyToMix $ clockFromDhm 0 9 40
200--   MixText "09:40"
201--
202--   >>> B.mixEncode $ clockFromDhm 0 9 40
203--   MixText "|09:40|"
204--
205clockBodyToMix :: Clock -> B.MixText
206clockBodyToMix c = body $ clockPos c where
207    sign = signToMix $ clockSign c
208    body (ClockDhms day sec)  = sign $ daySecToMix dhmsToMix day sec
209    body (ClockDhm  day sec)  = sign $ daySecToMix dhmToMix  day sec
210    body (ClockDh   day sec)  = sign $ daySecToMix dhToMix   day sec
211    body (ClockD    day)      = sign $ dayToMix day
212
213-- | Convert clock to positive clock.
214clockPos :: O.Map Clock
215clockPos = clockMap abs abs
216
217signToMix :: Int -> O.Map B.MixText
218signToMix (-1) m = B.mixString "-" O.++ m
219signToMix _    m = m
220
221daySecToMix :: (T.Sec -> (T.Days, B.MixText)) -> T.Days -> T.Sec -> B.MixText
222daySecToMix secMix day sec =
223    let (d, mx) = secMix sec
224    in case day + d of
225         0  -> mx
226         d2 -> dayToMix d2 O.++ mx
227
228mixColon :: O.Bin B.MixText
229mixColon = B.mixInfix ":"
230
231dhmsToMix :: T.Sec -> (T.Days, B.MixText)
232dhmsToMix sec = (d, hms) where
233    hms            = T.mix02 h `mixColon` T.mix02 m `mixColon` T.mix02 s
234    (d, h, m, s)   = dhmsFromSec $ abs sec
235
236dhmToMix :: T.Sec -> (T.Days, B.MixText)
237dhmToMix sec = (d, hm) where
238    hm             = T.mix02 h `mixColon` T.mix02 m
239    (d, h, m, _)   = dhmsFromSec sec
240
241dhToMix :: T.Sec -> (T.Days, B.MixText)
242dhToMix sec = (d, hm) where
243    hm             = T.mix02 h
244    (d, h, _, _)   = dhmsFromSec sec
245
246dayToMix :: T.Days -> B.MixText
247dayToMix d = B.mixDec d O.++ B.mixString "'"
248
249
250-- ----------------------  Map
251
252-- | Map MDJ and second of clock.
253clockMap :: O.Map T.Days -> O.Map T.Sec -> O.Map Clock
254clockMap f g (ClockDhms d s)  = adjust ClockDhms (f d) (g s)
255clockMap f g (ClockDhm  d s)  = adjust ClockDhm  (f d) (g s)
256clockMap f g (ClockDh   d s)  = adjust ClockDh   (f d) (g s)
257clockMap f _ (ClockD    d)    =        ClockD    (f d)
258
259-- | Combine MDJ and second of two clocks.
260clockMap2 :: O.Bin T.Days -> O.Bin T.Sec -> B.BinAb Clock
261clockMap2 f g (ClockDhms d s) (ClockDhms e t)  = adjustAb ClockDhms (f d e) (g s t)
262clockMap2 f g (ClockDhm  d s) (ClockDhm  e t)  = adjustAb ClockDhm  (f d e) (g s t)
263clockMap2 f g (ClockDh   d s) (ClockDh   e t)  = adjustAb ClockDh   (f d e) (g s t)
264clockMap2 f _ (ClockD    d)   (ClockD    e)    = Right  $ ClockD    (f d e)
265clockMap2 _ _ _ _ = Msg.adlib "clock"
266
267adjustAb :: (T.Days -> T.Sec -> Clock) -> T.Days -> T.Sec -> B.Ab Clock
268adjustAb k d s = Right $ adjust k d s
269
270adjust :: (T.Days -> T.Sec -> Clock) -> T.Days -> T.Sec -> Clock
271adjust k d s = let (d', s')  = daysSec s
272                   d2        = d + d'
273               in if d2 < 0 && s' > 0
274                  then k (d2 + 1) (s' - daySeconds)
275                  else k d2 s'
276
277
278-- ----------------------  Days and seconds
279
280-- | Days and seconds.
281type DaysSec = (T.Days, T.Sec)
282
283-- | Seconds in a day, i.e., 86400 seconds.
284--
285--   >>> daySeconds :: Int
286--   86400
287--
288daySeconds :: (Num a) => a
289daySeconds = 86400   -- 24 * 60 * 60
290
291-- | Calculate days and seconds.
292--
293--   >>> daysSec 777777
294--   (9, 177)
295--
296--   >>> daysSec (-777777)
297--   (-10, 86223)
298--
299daysSec :: T.Sec -> DaysSec
300daysSec s = let (d', s') = s `divMod` daySeconds
301            in (toInteger d', s')
302
